Player History
Released by Cleveland on 3/2/1965...
Drafted in 2nd round, 34th overall pick, by Texas in 1968...
Traded from Texas to Houston on 3/2/1968 (Going to TEX: C D. Pick. Going to HOU: 2B J. Orta)...
Injured on 4/4/1968 with a Pinched Nerve Neck, out for 5 days...
Injured on 8/12/1968 with a Strained Back, out for one week...
Injured on 6/21/1973 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 4/30/1976 with a Broken Nose, out for one week...
Injured on 8/7/1978 with a Inflamed Groin Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 4/12/1979, off Dennis Daboll (CIN)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/17/1979, off Mark Fidrych (SF)...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/14/1979, hitting .448 with 2 HR, 11 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/1/1979, hitting .474 with 1 HR, 6 RBI...
Won World Series with Houston in 1979...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/4/1980, hitting .391 with 2 HR, 9 RBI...
Traded from Houston to Los Angeles on 1/31/1981 (Going to LA: 3B J. Mumphrey, 2B J. Orta, P J. Palmer. Going to HOU: P C. Speck, C G. Goossen, 2B D. Garcia, CF R. Craig)...
Hit for the cycle against Cincinnati on 5/15/1981...
Hit for the cycle against Chicago (N) on 5/23/1981...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Philadelphia on 6/14/1981...
Injured on 7/20/1981 with a Inflamed Thigh Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 6 RBI against Chicago (N) on 8/6/1981...
Drove in 6 runs against San Francisco on 9/29/1983...
Signed as a free agent by California on 2/12/1985 to a 1-year deal worth $4,001,234 per year...
Injured on 4/15/1985 with a Strained Hip Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Drove in 6 runs against Oakland on 5/2/1985...
Had 26-game hitting streak snapped on 5/23/1985...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/1985, hitting .342 with 5 HR, 35 RBI...
Traded from California to New York (N) on 7/31/1985 (Going to NYM: 1B J. Orta. Going to CAL: P R. Fontenot, 2B T. Foli)...
Won World Series with New York (N) in 1985...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against St. Louis on 4/28/1987...
